revision.text:
==Discord Roles== This is the list of the Roles you can get in the official Pokeclicker Discord server
{| class="wikitable collapsible sortable" ! scope="col" | Role || scope=''col'' | Use || scope="col" | How to get |- | style="text-align:right" | Auto Reminder || Sends a dm about your /daily and /timely || rowspan=4|Use /roles on discord |- | style="text-align:right" | Happy Hour || Pings you for the Happy Hour |- | style="text-align:right" | Bot Updates || Pings you when the bot had a Update |- | style="text-align:right" | Game Updates || Pings you when the game had a Update |- | style="text-align:right" | Poké Squad || 20% Bonus to money of the !claim and !timely commands || 2,500 {{Pdollar}} |- | style="text-align:right" | 100k Club Role || Just gives you a Yellow name || 100,000 {{Pdollar}} |- | style="text-align:right" | Poke Crew || Gives you access to Pokeclicker Crew Channels || Colaborating to the game |- | style="text-align:right" | Wiki Contributor || Gives you access to Wiki Code Channel || Helping on the Wiki |- | style="text-align:right" | Code Contributor || N/A || Helping with the Developing of the Game |- | style="text-align:right" | Wiki Moderator || N/A || Helping on the Wiki for a long time |- | style="text-align:right" | Poké Master || 50% Bonus to money of the !claim and !timely commands || Boosting the Server |- | style="text-align:right" | Moderator || Gives you Admin Permissions || Proving you are worth of it |- | style="text-align:right" | Developer || You have all Admin Permissions and people Respect you || Colaborating Alot with the Game |- |} ''Note:Jk add the thing that are wrote on N/A''
[[Category:Discord]]
